law.catch_line: To the extent permissible under federal law, the Secretary may enter into or cooperate in arrangemen...
law.text: To the extent permissible under federal law, the Secretary may enter into or cooperate in arrangements with a foreign government under which facilities and services provided under this title and facilities and services provided under the unemployment insurance law of the foreign government may be used to take claims and pay benefits under this title or the unemployment insurance law of the foreign government.
